casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Bobby GRADY. No. 473P03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 10, 2004. Bobby Grady, 0151278, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 22nd day of January 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th day of February 2005."
